document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of bat-associated macronyssid mites (Acari: Gamasina: Macronyssidae) of Russia, with new host and geographical records

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Ornithonyssus pavlovskii Lange, 1959: 484
;
Zemskaya, 1966: 50
(synonymy by Radovsky, 1969 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material.
N1 ex
Myotis dasycneme (Boie, 1825)
from biological station “Lukashino”,
13 July 2018
, leg. O.L. Orlov , M. V . Orlova
.

Distribution in Russian Federation :
Leningrad Province (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Zemskaya, 1966 ), Penza Province (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Stanyukovich, 1997 ), Kirov Province (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Zemskaya, 1966 ), North Osetia (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Stanyukovich, 1997 ), Sverdlovsk Province (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Orlova & Orlov, 2011 ), Altai Region (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Marchenko, 2007 ), Khakassia Republic (
Orlova et al ., 2017a
), Buryatia Republic (Orlova et al ., 2016).

Distribution outside Russian Federation :
Europe (Great Britain— Evans & Till, 1966 , Spain— Quetglas, 2016 , etc .), Asia (Georgia: as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
— Stanyukovich, 1997 ), Central America (as
Ornithonyssus pipistrelli
—
Villegas-Guzman et al ., 2005
).

Hosts (Old World): [
Muscardinus avellanarius Linnaeus 1758
] ( Lange, 1959 ),
Myotis dasycneme ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . daubentonii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . brandtii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . mystacinus ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . ikonnikovi ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
M . nattereri ( Baker & Craven, 2003 )
,
M . sibiricus (
Orlova et al ., 2017a
)
,
M . escalerai Cabrera, 1904
( Quetglas, 2016 ),
Plecotus auritus ( Evans & Till, 1966 )
,
Pl . austriacus Fisher, 1829
( Baker & Craven, 2003 ),
Pipistrellus pipistrellus (Schreber, 1774) ( Beron, 2014 )
,
Pi . nathusii (Keyserling & Blasius, 1839) ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Eptesicus serotinus Schreber, 1774
( Evans & Till, 1966 ),
Ep . nilssonii ( Stanyukovich, 1997 )
,
Nyctalus noctula Schreber, 1774
( Stanyukovich, 1997 ).
